descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Ivica Zubac starts the game to continue his games played streak, then promptly commits a foul and checks out of the game.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Zubac commits deliberate foul, then exits six seconds in to keep streak alive) 2021/05/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Zubac commits deliberate foul, then exits six seconds in to keep streak alive

videos.description: Patrick Beverley denies Charlie Brown Jr.'s shot, then lobs one up to Terance Mann at the rim.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Beverley shows out on both ends with block, dime to Mann) 2021/05/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Beverley shows out on both ends with block, dime to Mann
